summary:
I am a loyal, enthusiastic and balanced person who over the years has gained an extensive international experience, both at management level (risk management, project finance, leverage finance, mergers and acquisitions, investment management) and at board level (with systemic bank, financial cooperative, start-up bank and corporate bank). 

A team player who likes to lead and collaborate with motivated colleagues in an entrepreneurial way to exceed profit targets based on a clear strategy. People appreciate my stable character, hardworking, not easily disturbed by professional stress. I value open, honest communication and can motivate and unite people. I have an open mind, am respectful to others, eager to learn and willing to change my opinion based on good arguments. I have a proven track record in turning around under-performing businesses. 

In large groups I tend to behave modestly, preferring a discussion in a smaller group to a superficial conversation with many persons. I am committed to the people I work with and I enjoy building a winning culture to get the best out of people and generate results. Feedback from peers include that I am structured, result-oriented and easy to approach. ‘What you see is what you get’; they do not perceive me a threatening and easily give their confidence. As a result, I know how to function well in (potential) conflict situations. 

In all, I am flexible in my style, sensitive to the environment and have the ability to act in different ways, depending what works best. I like to work in a dynamic and complex context in which I combine analytical skills with execution power. No surprise that I obtain energy from working in a high performing team where having fun is part of the process.

profile_positions.description:
I represent Rabobank in the Board of Directors of banks in Latin America where Rabo Partnerships hold a strategic minority interest. As such responsible for monitoring, control and advisory, while meeting the interests of the bank’s shareholders and other stakeholders. Next to strategic, business and financial issues, I deal with challenges related to corporate governance, corporate social responsibility, corporate ethics/values, HR, succession and risk and compliance. Depending on the requirements of the different banks, I am president or member of Credit, Alco, Corporate Governance, Audit & Compliance, strategy, HR, IT and/or Succession Committee.

Rabo Partnerships BV, a fully owned subsidiary of Rabobank  builds on 25 years of experience in strengthening financial institutions and cooperatives through sharing of knowledge and networks. The mission of Rabo Partnerships is to provide developing societies with improved access to financial services, employing cooperative principles and banking expertise. For this purpose, it offers advisory services, invests in financial institutions, and actively participates in networks, alliances and innovative value chain projects.

We believe that taking an ecosstem approach is key in all we do, as it will enable, enhance and scal financial inclusion, rural development and food security. The ecosystem approach means that together, we enable knowledge, network, and finance to reach those that need it most. We provide solutions based on partnerships. We focus on two out of the three transitions Rabobank wants to contribute to: A More Inclusive Society & Food Transition. Our strong conviction is that we can only grow a better world together in partnership with public and private sector partners.
profile_positions.title: External Director Latin America for Rabo Partnerships
